duties_responsibilities.duty: Take a hands-on approach to build a web-based mobile app for women who are postpartum, lead product development, and lay the technical groundwork for the company.
Build and lead a diverse engineering team, ensuring an exceptional user experience.
Collaborate closely with co-founders, IT Advisors, and designers to define and execute the technical vision/strategy for the company.
Lead the development of the minimum viable product (MVP), including building and assessing roadmap timing and resources, and iterating based on user feedback and market needs.
Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code using JavaScript and its frameworks, setting coding standards and following best practices.
Implement robust, secure, and scalable back-end solutions using AWS services.
Tackle complex technical challenges, troubleshoot issues, and ensure product stability, reliability, and security.
Work closely with cross-functional team members, such as product managers, and designers to align on product features, priorities, and timelines.
Continuously discover and assess technologies and features for the best fit for product iteration, to maximize development efficiency and improve app performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master’s preferred)
